name: RotherRadioXmas

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rother radio christmas
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to Rother Radio Christmas, South Yorkshire's Festive Station using your Alexa enabled device.

To start just say "Alexa, launch Rother Radio Christmas" or "Alexa, play Rother Radio Christmas" to start the radio playing.

We will continue to update and develop our Alexa service but we always welcome your feedback. Please send us your thoughts and suggestions to feedback@hmrmedia.co.uk
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
